startButtonInfo: ※ Only the host can start the game.
subject: Pick Ban Strategy Simulator

infoList.info: ※ You can participate in the team you want and prepare.
※ The Game Start button will be activated only when all teams are ready.
※ Those who do not participate in the team will be spectators.
※ You can deliver a room link through the room address 'copy' button at the top.
※ After starting the game, you can send the link through the 'copy' button at the bottom right.
※ You can chat in the chat window at the bottom left.

endInfoList.info: ※ First image: Download status before lane swap
